title: QSVM: Bloch Sphere Kernel
subtitle: QSVM Algorithm (with Bloch Sphere and Pauli feature Kernels)
description: Implementation of Quantum Support Vector Machines (QSVM): a hybrid quantum-classical classifier that embeds data via a parameterized quantum feature map and uses a quantum processor to evaluate the kernel for a classical SVM. The notebook builds the QSVM pipeline with Classiq and applies it to binary classification.
